title: Handle Truck Arriving for the Wrong Container
description: A truck arrives with an appointment to pick up container A, but they have physically brought container B to drop off.

tasks.description: Identify the mismatch between the appointment details (Pickup container A) and the OCR data (Dropoff container B).
tasks.expected_outcome: The gate system flags a 'Transaction Mismatch' error.

tasks.description: Inform the driver of the discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk clearly explains that their physical container does not match their appointment.

tasks.description: Instruct the driver to exit the gate, contact their dispatcher to get a new, correct appointment for container B, and then return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk provides clear instructions on how to resolve the problem.
